name: RGB Oberth Drone
description: One(1) RGB Oberth Drone The Oberth Drones are companions to the Oberth Colonists performing various tasks for them in new and unexplored regions. RGB goes about the environment in a colour terraforming kind of way. My main concern with these figures is to give collectors an opportunity to have a singular piece at an affordable level. Each figure is being produced by hand and therefore, each figure will be unique and have slight variations from each other. RGB is a maximum edition of 25 figures, each one being signed and numbered and stands approximately 5.5" tall. Additional images can be found at my Flickr.

name: CMYK Oberth Drone
description: One(1) CMYK Oberth Drone The Oberth Drones are companions to the Oberth Colonists performing various tasks for them in new and unexplored regions. CMYK performs similar tasks to RGB but with more graphic flair. My main concern with these figures is to give collectors an opportunity to have a singular piece at an affordable level. Each figure is being produced by hand and therefore, each figure will be unique and have slight variations from each other. CMYK is a maximum edition of 25 figures, each one being signed and numbered and stands approximately 5.5" tall. Additional images can be found at my Flickr.

name: Hatch Oberth Drone
description: The Oberth Drones are companions to the Oberth Colonists performing various tasks for them in new and unexplored regions. Hatch deals with the more hazardous elements they encounter - securing, analyzing and destroying if necessary. My main concern with these figures is to give collectors an opportunity to have a singular piece at an affordable level. Each figure is being produced by hand and therefore, each figure will be unique and have slight variations from each other. Hatch is a maximum edition of 25 figures, each one being signed and numbered and stands approximately 5.5" tall. Additional images can be found at my Flickr.

name: Any two Oberth Drones
description:
This is for any combination of two Oberth Drone figures.
